extendedInfo.description: Keywords: Word, Words, Word game, Words game, Word search, Scramble, scramble with words, words scramble, Word find, Word seek, Mystery word puzzle,Word search, Puzzle word, Vocabulary, brain training, Vocabulary Skill, Quality words match, English words form, Word find, Wordsearch, Wordfind, Wordsearch, spell word, WordsBoggler, Boggler free, Words Boggler free, Boggler for android, Words Boggler for android.Enjoy the WORDS BOGGLER GAME experience for free on your android smartphone and tablet.Put your word skills to test by finding words using alphabets placed up/down, left/right or diagonal to each other. Find as many words as you can within a time frame and learn new words each time you play this game.This game can be played alone or with friends of all ages.Words Boggler has improved the user's experience by enhancing the words finder algorithm and making the app bug free. This app is compatible with all android mobile phones and tablets including Samsung ,HTC, Motorola, Asus, Sony and others...Features:- A puzzle game Suitable for all age groups- Flexible time limits to choose from.- Displays all possible words that could be created at the end of each game.- Best Score Saving!Word Seek, Words Seek, Words Boggler, Boggler WordsWords Boggler Pro for Android Phones and Tablets without any AdsDisclaimer: Boggle(TM) is a registered trademark of Hasbro, with whom this app is in no way affiliated. Words Boggler offers a variant of  the traditional Boggle, with different rules of game play and board distribution. If you are looking to play traditional Boggle, please visit www.hasbro.com.

reviews.title: uninstalling
reviews.comment: Poorly made, freezes a lot so you can\'t make words, yet the clock keeps running. I think I\'ve had enough.
reviews.author: Elina Hilpinen

reviews.title: app freezes
reviews.comment: missing many words, frequently selects the wrong letter (keyboard optioned?), most of list of entered words isn\'t visible, & whole app freezes just about any time u pause the game :(
reviews.author: gidget marauder

reviews.title: Untouched
reviews.comment: Small touch panel, lags, missing words....not recommended....better freeword games out there #blah#blah#BAM!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some will enjoy this.
reviews.comment: It just isn\'t my cup of tea.
reviews.author: Dawn R.F.

reviews.title: Boggler
reviews.comment: Would give you five stars, but game needs a rotate button and a music off button.
reviews.author: Wanda Feliciano

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Can\'t turn volume off independent of system volume. Laggy touch response.
reviews.author: Allan Page

reviews.title: Poor controls
reviews.comment: Very hard to choose word. Its dictionary lacks too many words.
reviews.author: Ariel Vered

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: Love the game. Not sure why their logo is a swastika...
reviews.author: Lauren Morris

reviews.title: Worst boggle ever!
reviews.comment: Where to start. The sound stops randomly. It excepts words that do not exist(I checked the doctionary) and words that are abbreviations and shouldn\'t count. Just terrible. Do not install!
reviews.author: Stephanie Murphy

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: The game is fun but i can\'t figure out how to turn off the sound.
reviews.author: Lily Bennett

reviews.comment: It accepts non-english words that don\'t exist = unfair. If you pause, the timer doesn\'t work when unpaused so loose score. Not enough settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea but...
reviews.comment: What\'s with all the words? It\'d be nice if it pulled words just from a standard English dictionary. Then it\'d be closer to actual boggle rules. Uninstalling cause off this and especially obnoxious winning sound effect.
reviews.author: Ben Crow

reviews.title: Horrible touch of the letters
reviews.comment: Please fix the touch i find its too slow, and i lose out on getting words please fix asap then i will give 5 stars
reviews.author: Jenn C

reviews.title: Loud
reviews.comment: Fun game but can\'t get sound to shut off so limits where I can play the game.
reviews.author: Sarah Yarry

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: amazing game darshan bhaiya....great creativity...very addictive
reviews.author: Anju jain

reviews.title: Words boggler awesome & excellent game
reviews.comment: Words boggle kill my lazy and boring time, if i start to play this game i get a energetic & fresh my mind set. Words boggle also helps with learning spelling!!. Totally words boggle was awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User
